movie_title: Is your guy playing this Sunday? Watch #SuperBowlLVIII on CBS, Paramount+ and Nickelodeon. #SBLVIII
introduction: Is your favorite playing this Sunday?! Donâ€™t miss #SuperBowlLVIII on CBS, Paramount+ and Nickelodeon
lead_intro: Join us in this quiz based on a mix of universities and names to test your attention to detail!

quiz.question: Which university is located in Texas?
quiz.explanation: Texas A&M is the university mentioned in the text as being in Texas.

quiz.question: Which university is associated with Quatro Quatro San?
quiz.explanation: Quatro Quatro San is linked to Saskatchewan University in the text.

quiz.question: Who is affiliated with Missouri Western State University?
quiz.explanation: Wayne is mentioned alongside Missouri Western State University.

quiz.question: Which university is located in South Dakota?
quiz.explanation: South Dakota State University is the one situated in South Dakota.

quiz.question: Which university has the initials TG?
quiz.explanation: The university with the initials TG is Jones college according to the text.
